## Data Dictionary

Column Name        | Description                                       | Data Type          | Example               |
|----------------|---------------------------------------------------|------------------- |-----------------------|
| Invoice        | Unique identifier for each invoice.               | String / Integer   | "INV001"              |
| StockCode      | Unique code assigned to each product or item.     | String             | "A1234"               |
| Description    | Brief description of the product or item.         | String             | "Red Widget"          |
| Quantity       | Number of units sold in the invoice.              | Integer            | 5                     |
| InvoiceDate    | Date when the invoice was generated.              | Date / Timestamp   | "2024-10-01"          |
| Price          | Price per unit of the product or item.            | Float              | 19.99                 |
| Customer ID    | Unique identifier for the customer.               | String / Integer   | "CUST123"             |
| Country        | Country where the customer is located.            | String
